functions.name: registerChromeUrl
functions.description: Register folders which should be available as chrome:// urls (as defined in the legacy chrome.manifest)

functions.name: registerApiFolder
functions.description: Declare the location of the folder which contains the JSM files belonging to this API.

parameters.name: aPath
parameters.description: Either the chrome:// path to the folder or its relative location from the root of the extension (in case of pure WX). If a JSM is loaded via relative path, it cannot be loaded via chrome path in other parts of the addon!

functions.name: notifyStartupCompleted
functions.description: Notify legacy code that startup of WebExtension has finished.

functions.name: registerUnloadScript
functions.description: Register a script, which is executed upon add-on shutdown

parameters.name: aPath
parameters.description: Either the chrome:// path to the script or its relative location from the root of the extension,

functions.name: setOverlayVerbosity
functions.description: Sets the verbosity of the overlay manager.

functions.name: getOverlayVerbosity
functions.description: Gets the verbosity of the overlay manager.
